title: Garamond vs Garamond | physiologie d’un caractère typographique
content:
Jim Coudal from Coudal Partners:

"So perfect. Design et Typo recently posted about the variety and personalities of [various versions of the typeface Garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010195908/http:/paris.blog.lemonde.fr/2006/09/21/2006_09_garamond_vs_gar/). [[translate](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010195908/http:/www.google.com/translate?u=http%3A%2F%2Fparis.blog.lemonde.fr%2F2006%2F09%2F21%2F2006_09_garamond_vs_gar%2F&langpair=fr%7Cen&hl=en&ie=UTF8)] Today, with a lovely metaphor and a sublime demonstration, Peter enhances the point using the cello, [As Many Differences as Between Two Drawings of Garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010195908/http:/paris.blog.lemonde.fr/2007/02/23/viloloncelle-vs-violoncelle-autant-de-differences-quentre-deux-dessins-du-garamond/). Me? #2, Yo-Yo Ma."
author: brampitoyo
